casebody.data:
BENDETTO SCHEPS v. SCHUYLER C. VAN CLEEF ET AL. Submitted October term, 1928 Decided January 3, 1929.

Before Justices Mintuen, Black and Campbell.

Contra, John E. Toolan (Schuyler C. Van Cleef pro se). Eor the applicant, Thomas W. Brown. Pee Cueiam.

We conclude that the reasons and grounds urged under this rule are sufficient to warrant the allowance of the writ applied for.

' The writ will therefore be allowed.
